_description: Let Reason defeat Will — one cross-rhymed quatrain

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
I count his conquest greateThat canne by reasons scylleSubdue
                    affections heateAnd conquer wanton wylle
DULCosViii9.Note: Added to right margin, sideways, top to bottom.
